籤詩版本二:
Haʻi ʻana i nā mele i ka napoʻo ʻana o ka lā, hīmeni i nā mele ma lalo o ka mahina, ʻakaʻaka i kēlā me kēia manawa
Ke hui kakou, pe'e kakou iloko o ka pilikia, a himeni pu i ka Lianliluo, 'o Lianli ka laau mau. He hōʻailona ia i ka lokahi ma waena o ke kāne a me ka wahine. Luo Zhiwang. ʻO ia hoʻi, ua pili kekahi i kekahi. A i ʻole ke kilika a me ka satin e pili ana i nā lole waihoʻoluʻu.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram no ka mālama ʻana i nā mea kahiko a hoʻololi i kēlā me kēia manawa.
He pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: Aia ka nani i ka hale. Himeni poem. Ua hauʻoli. Pōmaikaʻi a pōʻino.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua pilikia ʻo Su Xiaomei
Ma ka moʻokūʻauhau mele, ʻo Su Xiaomei ke kaikaina o Su Dongpo. He naʻauao a akamai ʻo ia. I ko lāua pō male ʻana, heluhelu ʻo Su Xiaomei i nā mele a kākau i nā hui. ʻEkolu mau nīnau paʻakikī i hoʻomākaukau ʻia e hoʻāʻo ai i ka hūnōna kāne, a ua hana ʻo ia i mea paʻakikī i ke kāne kāne ʻo Qin Shaoyou.
ʻO ka mea pōmaikaʻi, ua kōkua malū ʻo Su Dongpo iā ia ma mua o kona hiki ʻana i ke keʻena mare.
Aia kekahi poem e olelo ana:
Ua ʻōlelo nā ʻatikala mai ka wā kahiko, ʻoi aku ke akamai o ke kaikaina ma mua o kāna kāne;
He mea e ke kane mare o Three Difficulties, he hale nani i lua ole i ka honua.
聖意: Pōmaikaʻi no ka home, laki maikaʻi nou iho, laki maikaʻi no ka ʻoihana, laki maikaʻi no ka male ʻana, laki maikaʻi no ka wahine, hele wāwae ma nā kula, ʻano silika pala, holoholona waiwai, laki maikaʻi no ka poʻe, laki no ka hoʻopiʻi ʻana, laki no ka neʻe ʻana. , laki no ka waiwai nalowale, laki no ka mai, laki no ka mai, laki no na lua kupapau mauna
